pullrequest.title: LinkPlot3dPlugin: read optional <model> tag to find links in nested models

content.raw:
using `/` as separator for nested models in 9c2b5ae

tested with the following

~~~
diff -r 68dbeb55bdaf worlds/friction_pyramid.world
--- a/worlds/friction_pyramid.world	Thu Mar 28 15:37:26 2019 -0700
+++ b/worlds/friction_pyramid.world	Fri Mar 29 18:00:49 2019 -0700
@@ -1506,6 +1506,7 @@
         </plugin>
       </model>
       <model name='box_31'>
+      <model name='box_31'>
         <pose>8.827067523629072 -1.7558128981451584 0.1 0 -0 0</pose>
         <link name='link_1'>
           <inertial>
@@ -1553,6 +1554,7 @@
           <angular>0 0 0</angular>
         </plugin>
       </model>
+      </model>
       <plugin name="3dplot" filename="libLinkPlot3DPlugin.so">
         <frequency>10</frequency>
         <plot>
@@ -1742,7 +1744,7 @@
           <material>Gazebo/Blue</material>
         </plot>
         <plot>
-          <model>box_31</model>
+          <model>box_31/box_31</model>
           <link>link_1</link>
           <pose>0 0 1 0 0 0</pose>
           <material>Gazebo/Blue</material>
~~~
content.html:
using / as separator for nested models in 9c2b5ae

tested with the following

diff -r 68dbeb55bdaf worlds/friction_pyramid.world
--- a/worlds/friction_pyramid.world Thu Mar 28 15:37:26 2019 -0700
+++ b/worlds/friction_pyramid.world Fri Mar 29 18:00:49 2019 -0700
@@ -1506,6 +1506,7 @@
         </plugin>
       </model>
       <model name='box_31'>
+      <model name='box_31'>
         <pose>8.827067523629072 -1.7558128981451584 0.1 0 -0 0</pose>
         <link name='link_1'>
           <inertial>
@@ -1553,6 +1554,7 @@
           <angular>0 0 0</angular>
         </plugin>
       </model>
+      </model>
       <plugin name="3dplot" filename="libLinkPlot3DPlugin.so">
         <frequency>10</frequency>
         <plot>
@@ -1742,7 +1744,7 @@
           <material>Gazebo/Blue</material>
         </plot>
         <plot>
-          <model>box_31</model>
+          <model>box_31/box_31</model>
           <link>link_1</link>
           <pose>0 0 1 0 0 0</pose>
           <material>Gazebo/Blue</material>
